description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐玄宗李隆基第三子。在安史之乱中即位于灵州，指挥唐军反攻并收复两京。他重用宦官李辅国，宠信张皇后，导致朝廷内部纷争，最终在由李辅国发动的针对张皇后的宫廷政变中受惊吓而驾崩。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang Dynasty, the third son of Emperor Xuanzong Li Longji. He ascended the throne in Lingzhou during the An-Shi Rebellion, directing the Tang army's counterattack and recapturing the two capitals. His heavy reliance on the eunuch Li Fuguo and favor towards Empress Zhang led to internal court conflicts, and he ultimately died of shock during a palace coup initiated by Li Fuguo against the empress.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝在位时间最长的皇帝，唐肃宗之父。在安史之乱中退位为太上皇。
description.en: The longest-reigning emperor of the Tang Dynasty and the father of Emperor Suzong. He abdicated and became Taishang Huang (Emperor Emeritus) during the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的妃嫔，唐肃宗的生母，被追尊为皇太后。
description.en: A concubine of Emperor Xuanzong and the biological mother of Emperor Suzong. She was posthumously honored as Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗长子，唐朝皇帝。在张皇后与李辅国的权力斗争中被拥立为帝。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Suzong and an emperor of the Tang Dynasty. He was enthroned amidst the power struggle between Empress Zhang and Li Fuguo.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝由盛转衰的转折点，一场由安禄山和史思明发动的叛乱。这场动乱使得时为太子的李亨得以在灵武自行登基。
description.en: A turning point in the Tang Dynasty from prosperity to decline, a rebellion initiated by An Lushan and Shi Siming. The turmoil allowed the then-Crown Prince Li Heng to ascend the throne independently in Lingwu.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗与武则天之女，唐玄宗的姑姑。因不满当时身为太子的玄宗，曾试图让其将腹中的李亨堕胎。
description.en: The daughter of Emperor Gaozong and Wu Zetian, and the aunt of Emperor Xuanzong. Due to her dissatisfaction with Xuanzong when he was the crown prince, she attempted to make him induce an abortion of the future Emperor Suzong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相、文学家。曾劝说唐玄宗保住当时尚在腹中的唐肃宗。
description.en: A chancellor and writer of the Tang Dynasty. He persuaded Emperor Xuanzong to save the unborn Emperor Suzong.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期的宰相，因支持寿王李瑁而与被立为太子的李亨为敌，并多次试图构陷他。
description.en: A chancellor during the reign of Emperor Xuanzong. He became an enemy of Li Heng after Li Heng was made crown prince, as he supported the Prince of Shou, Li Mao, and repeatedly tried to frame him.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗为太子时的正妃。因其兄韦坚被李林甫诬陷，被迫与肃宗离异，出家为尼。
description.en: The principal consort of Emperor Suzong when he was the crown prince. Due to her brother Wei Jian being framed by Li Linfu, she was forced to divorce Suzong and become a nun.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗的皇后。在肃宗病重时图谋杀害太子李豫，改立越王李系，但因宦官李辅国发动政变而被杀。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Suzong. When Suzong was critically ill, she conspired to kill Crown Prince Li Yu and replace him with the Prince of Yue, Li Xi, but was killed in a coup initiated by the eunuch Li Fuguo.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗时期权倾朝野的宦官。他软禁太上皇玄宗，后又发动政变杀死张皇后，拥立唐代宗，其政变行动惊吓导致了肃宗的死亡。
description.en: A powerful eunuch during Emperor Suzong's reign. He placed Emperor Emeritus Xuanzong under house arrest, later launched a coup to kill Empress Zhang, and installed Emperor Daizong. His coup actions led to the death of Emperor Suzong from shock.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱期间，护送唐玄宗逃亡的禁军士兵发生的哗变，导致杨国忠和杨贵妃被杀。事件后，太子李亨与玄宗分道扬镳，为李亨自行即位创造了条件。
description.en: A mutiny by imperial guards escorting Emperor Xuanzong during the An-Shi Rebellion, which resulted in the deaths of Yang Guozhong and Yang Guifei. After the event, Crown Prince Li Heng separated from Xuanzong, creating the conditions for his own enthronement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名将，在安史之乱中为平定叛乱做出巨大贡献，是唐肃宗反攻的核心军事将领。
description.en: A famous general of the Tang Dynasty who made significant contributions to quelling the An-Shi Rebellion. He was a core military commander in Emperor Suzong's counter-offensive.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名将，在安史之乱中与郭子仪齐名，是唐肃宗反攻的核心军事将领。
description.en: A famous general of the Tang Dynasty, renowned alongside Guo Ziyi during the An-Shi Rebellion. He was a core military commander in Emperor Suzong's counter-offensive.

description.zh-cn: 一个突厥汗国，在安史之乱期间与唐肃宗结盟，派遣骑兵帮助唐军收复两京。
description.en: A Turkic khaganate that allied with Emperor Suzong during the An-Shi Rebellion, dispatching cavalry to help the Tang army recapture the two capitals.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝节度使，安史之乱的主要发动者，后被其子安庆绪所杀。
description.en: A military governor of the Tang Dynasty and the primary initiator of the An-Shi Rebellion. He was later killed by his son, An Qingxu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝将领，安史之乱的主要发动者之一。
description.en: A general of the Tang Dynasty and one of the main initiators of the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 安禄山之子，弑父自立为帝。
description.en: Son of An Lushan, who killed his father and declared himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期的宰相，杨贵妃的堂兄。在马嵬驿兵变中被哗变的士兵所杀。
description.en: A chancellor during Emperor Xuanzong's reign and a cousin of Yang Guifei. He was killed by mutinous soldiers during the Mutiny at Mawei.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的宠妃。在马嵬驿兵变中被玄宗赐死。
description.en: The beloved consort of Emperor Xuanzong. She was forced by Xuanzong to commit suicide during the Mutiny at Mawei.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗之子。张皇后试图拥立他为新太子，但在李辅国的政变中被杀。
description.en: Son of Emperor Suzong. Empress Zhang attempted to install him as the new crown prince, but he was killed in the coup led by Li Fuguo.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宦官，李辅国的亲信。奉李辅国之命率军入宫杀死了张皇后和越王李系。
description.en: A eunuch of the Tang Dynasty and a confidant of Li Fuguo. Under Li Fuguo's orders, he led troops into the palace and killed Empress Zhang and the Prince of Yue, Li Xi.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期最为信任的宦官之一。在李辅国掌权后，被构陷并流放。
description.en: One of the most trusted eunuchs during Emperor Xuanzong's reign. After Li Fuguo came to power, he was framed and exiled.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗的陵墓。
description.en: The mausoleum of Emperor Suzong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗李亨是唐玄宗李隆基的第三子。
description.en: Emperor Suzong Li Heng was the third son of Emperor Xuanzong Li Longji.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗李亨的生母是杨妃，后被追尊为元献皇太后。
description.en: Emperor Suzong Li Heng's biological mother was Consort Yang, who was posthumously honored as Empress Dowager Yuanxian.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗李豫是唐肃宗李亨的长子。
description.en: Emperor Daizong Li Yu was the eldest son of Emperor Suzong Li Heng.

description.zh-cn: 在唐肃宗出生前，太平公主因对时为太子的唐玄宗不满，试图说服玄宗将尚在腹中的肃宗堕胎。
description.en: Before Emperor Suzong was born, Princess Taiping, dissatisfied with the then-Crown Prince Xuanzong, tried to persuade him to abort the fetus.

description.zh-cn: 在唐玄宗准备堕胎时，其幕僚张说请求玄宗收回成命，保住了唐肃宗。
description.en: When Emperor Xuanzong was preparing to induce an abortion, his advisor Zhang Yue requested him to retract the order, thus saving the future Emperor Suzong.

description.zh-cn: 李林甫曾支持寿王李瑁，因此在李亨被立为太子后，惧怕其报复并企图将其推翻。
description.en: Li Linfu had supported the Prince of Shou, Li Mao, and therefore feared retaliation from Li Heng after he was made crown prince, and attempted to overthrow him.

description.zh-cn: 在天宝年间，李林甫为构陷太子李亨，诬陷太子妃韦氏的兄长韦坚，导致韦氏被迫与李亨离异并出家为尼。
description.en: During the Tianbao era, in order to frame Crown Prince Li Heng, Li Linfu falsely accused Crown Princess Wei's brother, Wei Jian, which led to Wei being forced to divorce Li Heng and become a nun.

description.zh-cn: 韦氏是唐肃宗为太子时的正妃。
description.en: Lady Wei was the principal consort of Emperor Suzong when he was the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 张氏原为太子良娣，后成为唐肃宗的皇后。
description.en: Lady Zhang was originally a Liangdi (a rank for crown prince's consort) and later became Emperor Suzong's empress.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱爆发，唐玄宗出逃，太子李亨在马嵬驿与玄宗分道后，前往灵州自行登基为帝。
description.en: The An-Shi Rebellion broke out, forcing Emperor Xuanzong to flee. After separating from Xuanzong at Mawei Post, Crown Prince Li Heng proceeded to Lingzhou and ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗即位后，组织朔方军等力量，联合回鹘进行反攻，收复了长安和洛阳，逐步控制了叛乱。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Suzong organized forces such as the Shuofang Army and allied with the Uyghurs to launch a counter-offensive, recapturing Chang'an and Luoyang and gradually bringing the rebellion under control.

description.zh-cn: 在马嵬驿兵变中，宰相杨国忠被哗变的禁军士兵杀死。
description.en: During the Mutiny at Mawei, Chancellor Yang Guozhong was killed by the mutinous imperial guards.

description.zh-cn: 在马嵬驿兵变中，杨贵妃被唐玄宗下令赐死。
description.en: During the Mutiny at Mawei, Yang Guifei was ordered by Emperor Xuanzong to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 郭子仪是唐肃宗任命的将领，率领朔方军等部队平定安史之乱。
description.en: Guo Ziyi was a general appointed by Emperor Suzong, who led the Shuofang Army and other troops to suppress the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 李光弼是唐肃宗在平定安史之乱时倚重的主要将领之一。
description.en: Li Guangbi was one of the key generals relied upon by Emperor Suzong in suppressing the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗与回鹘结盟，借其兵力以反攻叛军，收复两京。
description.en: Emperor Suzong formed an alliance with the Uyghur Khaganate, borrowing their military strength to counter-attack the rebel forces and recapture the two capitals.

description.zh-cn: 至德二载（757年）正月，安禄山被其子安庆绪杀死。
description.en: In the first month of the second year of Zhide (757), An Lushan was killed by his son An Qingxu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆绪是安禄山的儿子。
description.en: An Qingxu was the son of An Lushan.

description.zh-cn: 李辅国趁机构陷，称太上皇玄宗预谋复辟，并将其软禁于西宫。
description.en: Li Fuguo seized an opportunity to frame the Emperor Emeritus Xuanzong, claiming he was plotting a restoration, and placed him under house arrest in the Western Palace.

description.zh-cn: 在李辅国构陷唐玄宗后，将玄宗亲信高力士流放到巫州。
description.en: After framing Emperor Xuanzong, Li Fuguo had Xuanzong's trusted confidant Gao Lishi exiled to Wuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 宝应元年，张皇后在肃宗病重时图谋杀害太子李俶（即唐代宗），以改立越王李系。
description.en: In the first year of Baoying (762), while Emperor Suzong was critically ill, Empress Zhang plotted to kill Crown Prince Li Chu (later Emperor Daizong) to install the Prince of Yue, Li Xi, instead.

description.zh-cn: 宝应元年，张皇后图谋废黜太子李俶，改立越王李系。
description.en: In the first year of Baoying (762), Empress Zhang plotted to depose Crown Prince Li Chu and replace him with the Prince of Yue, Li Xi.

description.zh-cn: 李辅国为保护太子，发动政变，命令程元振率禁军入宫平乱，杀死了张皇后。
description.en: To protect the crown prince, Li Fuguo launched a coup, ordering Cheng Yuanzhen to lead the imperial guards into the palace to quell the conspiracy, killing Empress Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 在李辅国发动的政变中，张皇后试图拥立的越王李系一同被杀。
description.en: During the coup initiated by Li Fuguo, the Prince of Yue, Li Xi, whom Empress Zhang had tried to enthrone, was also killed.

description.zh-cn: 程元振是李辅国的亲信，奉其命令率军入宫平乱。
description.en: Cheng Yuanzhen was a confidant of Li Fuguo and, under his orders, led troops into the palace to quell the conspiracy.

description.zh-cn: 程元振奉李辅国之命，率领射生军入宫平乱，杀死了张皇后。
description.en: Under Li Fuguo's orders, Cheng Yuanzhen led the Shesheng Army into the palace to quell the conspiracy, killing Empress Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 李辅国发动政变，擒杀张皇后等人，使得病重的唐肃宗受到惊吓而驾崩。
description.en: Li Fuguo launched a coup, capturing and killing Empress Zhang and others, which caused the critically ill Emperor Suzong to die of shock.

description.zh-cn: 在杀死张皇后后，李辅国拥立太子李俶（即唐代宗）于肃宗灵前继位。
description.en: After killing Empress Zhang, Li Fuguo enthroned Crown Prince Li Chu (later Emperor Daizong) before the coffin of Emperor Suzong.
